column5: Does anyone know a place in GTA that has a good selection of end guides?

Go see Tom @ Angling Specialties.  Ditto!  I brought in a rod to him to have a new set of guides put on an older rod. He's up along Hwy. 7 and is usually there on Wednesdays & Fridays. The guy is a legend.  I think his wife does the guides and wraps and he turns the handles.
His wife does all the work
Awesome. I will go by and drop them off. Hopefully they can turn them around for me in time.
